Code licensed under the BSD License: http://developer.yahoo.net/yui/license.txt version: 2.7.0 */ html{color:#000;background:#FFF;}body,div,dl,dt,dd,ul,ol,li,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,pre,code,form,fieldset,legend,input,button,textarea,p,blockquote,th,td{margin:0;padding:0;}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;}fieldset,img{border:0;}address,caption,cite,code,dfn,em,strong,th,var,optgroup{font-style:inherit;font-weight:inherit;}del,ins{text-decoration:none;}li{list-style:none;}caption,th{text-align: {vb:stylevar left};}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-size:100%;font-weight:normal;}q:before,q:after{content:'';}abbr,acronym{border:0;font-variant:normal;}sup{vertical-align:baseline;}sub{vertical-align:baseline;}legend{color:#848484;}input,button,textarea,select,optgroup,option{font-family:inherit;font-size:inherit;font-style:inherit;font-weight:inherit;}input,button,textarea,select{*font-size:100%;}body{font:13px/1.231 arial,helvetica,clean,sans-serif;*font-size:small;*font:x-small;}select,input,button,textarea,button{font:99% arial,helvetica,clean,sans-serif;}table{font-size:inherit;font:100%;}pre,code,kbd,samp,tt{font-family:monospace;*font-size:108%;line-height:100%;}

<style type="text/css" id="vbulletin_yuiupload_css">

#upload_controls_yui {
	position:relative;
	text-align:{vb:stylevar left};
}

#yui_clearlist, #yui_uploadfiles, #yui_selectfilestext {
	padding:2px;
	/*text-align:center;*/
	/*border:1px solid #808080;*/
	white-space:nowrap;
	/*background-color:#ABCDEF;*/
	cursor:pointer;
}


#yui_basicupload {
	text-decoration:underline;
	cursor:pointer;
	position:absolute;
	{vb:stylevar right}:0;
	bottom:0;
	font-size:{vb:stylevar small_fontSize};
}

.displayinline {
	display:-moz-inline-box;
	display:inline-block;
	*display:inline;
	zoom:1;
}

#yui_uploadfiles {
	margin:0 4px;
}

#yui_selectfiles {
	position:absolute;
	width:10px;
	height:10px;
	-moz-border-radius:5px;
	-webkit-border-radius:5px;
	border-radius:5px;
}

.yui_selectfiles_hover {
	background-color:rgb(255,255,200);
	color:{vb:stylevar linkhover_color};
}


.yui_controls {
	text-align:center;
/*	height:19px;*/
	width:400px; /* Damn you IE6/7 */
	position:relative;
}

/*
#yui_clearlist:hover, #yui_uploadfiles:hover, #yui_selectfiles:hover {
	border:1px solid red;
}
*/

.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_contents #uploadprogress_container * {
	color:{vb:stylevar assetmanager_upload_color};
}

.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_contents #uploadprogress_container,
#uploadprogress_container {
	background:{vb:stylevar assetmanager_upload_background};
	color:{vb:stylevar assetmanager_upload_color};
	width:400px;
	height:115px;
	border:{vb:stylevar forumhead_border};
	text-align:{vb:stylevar left};
	background:{vb:stylevar blockrow_background};
	overflow:auto;
}

#fileheader {
	float:{vb:stylevar left};
}

#sizeheader {
	float:{vb:stylevar left};
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:275px;
	overflow:hidden;
}

#uploadprogress_container li {
	padding:3px;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #CCCCCC;
	font:{vb:stylevar small_fontSize} {vb:stylevar font.fontFamily};
	background: url(uploadprogress.gif) repeat-y -400px 0;
	height:16px;
}
.uploadprogress_container ul, .uploadprogress_container li {
	clear:both;
}
#uploadprogress_container .name, #uploadprogress_container .size, #uploadprogress_container .delete {
	float:{vb:stylevar left};
	overflow:hidden;
	white-space:nowrap;
}
#uploadprogress_container .name {
	width:275px;
}

#uploadprogress_container .size {
	width:60px;
	text-align:{vb:stylevar right};
}

#uploadprogress_container .delete {
	width:40px;
	text-align:{vb:stylevar right};
}

.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_contents #uploadprogress_container .delete button,
#uploadprogress_container .delete button {
	border: {vb:stylevar control_border};
	color: {vb:stylevar control_color};
	background:{vb:stylevar control_background};
	padding-bottom:1px;
	width:13px;
	height:14px;
	font-weight:bold;
	cursor:pointer;
	font-size:{vb:stylevar tiny_fontSize};
	vertical-align:middle;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}:2px;
}

.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_contents #uploadprogress_container .delete button:hover,
#uploadprogress_container .delete button:hover	{
	background:{vb:stylevar control_hover_background};
